verses.verse: And it came to pass<WH1961> after<WH4480> <WH310> this,<WH3651> that Absalom<WH53> prepared<WH6213> him chariots<WH4818> and horses,<WH5483> and fifty<WH2572> men<WH376> to run<WH7323> before<WH6440> him.

For <WH3588> thy servant<WH5650> vowed<WH5087> a vow<WH5088> while I abode<WH3427> at Geshur<WH1650> in Syria,<WH758> saying,<WH559> If<WH518> the LORD<WH3068> shall bring me again<WH7725> indeed to Jerusalem,<WH3389> then I will serve<WH5647> <WH853> the LORD.<WH3068>
And the king<WH4428> said<WH559> unto him, Go<WH1980> in peace.<WH7965> So he arose,<WH6965> and went<WH1980> to Hebron.<WH2275>

But Absalom<WH53> sent<WH7971> spies<WH7270> throughout all<WH3605> the tribes<WH7626> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> As soon as ye hear<WH8085> <WH853> the sound<WH6963> of the trumpet,<WH7782> then ye shall say,<WH559> Absalom<WH53> reigneth<WH4427> in Hebron.<WH2275>

And with<WH854> Absalom<WH53> went<WH1980> two hundred<WH3967> men<WH376> out of Jerusalem,<WH4480> <WH3389> that were called;<WH7121> and they went<WH1980> in their simplicity,<WH8537> and they knew<WH3045> not<WH3808> any<WH3605> thing.<WH1697>

And there came<WH935> a messenger<WH5046> to<WH413> David,<WH1732> saying,<WH559> The hearts<WH3820> of the men<WH376> of Israel<WH3478> are<WH1961> after<WH310> Absalom.<WH53>

And the king's<WH4428> servants<WH5650> said<WH559> unto<WH413> the king,<WH4428> Behold,<WH2009> thy servants<WH5650> are ready to do whatsoever<WH834> <WH3605> my lord<WH113> the king<WH4428> shall appoint.<WH977>

And all<WH3605> the country<WH776> wept<WH1058> with a loud<WH1419> voice,<WH6963> and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> passed over:<WH5674> the king<WH4428> also himself passed over<WH5674> the brook<WH5158> Kidron,<WH6939> and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> passed over,<WH5674> toward<WH5921> <WH6440> the way<WH1870> of<WH853> the wilderness.<WH4057>

And lo<WH2009> Zadok<WH6659> also,<WH1571> and all<WH3605> the Levites<WH3881> were with<WH854> him, bearing<WH5375> <WH853> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of God:<WH430> and they set down<WH3332> <WH853> the ark<WH727> of God;<WH430> and Abiathar<WH54> went up,<WH5927> until<WH5704> all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> had done<WH8552> passing<WH5674> out of<WH4480> the city.<WH5892>

The king<WH4428> said<WH559> also unto<WH413> Zadok<WH6659> the priest,<WH3548> Art not thou<WH859> a seer?<WH7200> return<WH7725> into the city<WH5892> in peace,<WH7965> and your two<WH8147> sons<WH1121> with<WH854> you, Ahimaaz<WH290> thy son,<WH1121> and Jonathan<WH3083> the son<WH1121> of Abiathar.<WH54>
